item.title: Suzhou is gaining more recognition in the MICE industry
item.description:
The Suzhou Culture and Expo Centre Company (SCECC), which manages the Suzhou Culture and Arts Centre and the Suzhou International Expo Centre, claims that Suzhou is arguably the top Meetings, Incentives, Conferences and Exhibitions (MICE) destination in China. SCECC highlights Suzhou’s success in hosting significant events, such as the 53rd World Table Tennis Championships earlier this year and Armani’s selection of the city’s Humble Administrator’s Garden as the venue for the global debut of its Pivoine Suzhou perfume...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/suzhou-is-gaining-more-recognition-in-the-mice-industry/
